丁目: (choume) - distrito de uma cidade, quarteirão (de tamanho irregular)

七イマーム派: (しちイマームは) - Sevener Shiism; branch of Shia Islam

七仏: (しちぶつ) - the seven previous incarnations of Buddha

七光り: (ななひかり) - benefiting from the influence of a master or parent
七公三民: (しちこうさんみん) - (yoji) land-tax rate during the Edo period, in which the government took 70 percent of the year's crop and the farmers kept 30 percent
七分: (しちぶん) - type of baggy tobi trousers with the baggy part taking up seven-tenths of the full length of the trouser leg
七分三分: (しちぶさんぶ) - (yoji) seven to three (chances)
七分搗き: (しちぶづき) - seventy percent polished rice

七十路: (ななそじ) - age seventy; one's seventies

七堂伽藍: (しちどうがらん) - complete seven-structured temple compound

七夜: (しちや) - celebration of a child's seventh day
